title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about buying a gold ring by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about buying a gold ring varies depending on the social and psychological state of the beholder, but in most commentators’ statements it expresses goodness for its owner, and that there is almost a relief in a crisis or dilemma he has fallen into, and an indication of stability. Between the two partners, it was also said that it indicates the gender of the pregnant woman’s fetus. Interpretation of a dream about buying a gold ring by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about buying a gold ring? When a person sees himself buying a gold ring, he is on his way to a big project that will be his first step towards a bright future. Lots of profits. But if the young man is single and buys a beautiful ring, he will marry the girl he loves in his heart. If the girl studying sees this dream and is afraid of exams and feels unprepared for them, then buying it is evidence of her superiority and obtaining the highest grades that she did not expect. It is also It expresses the new ideas that appear in the mind of the fortuneteller, and if he applies them, he will find impressive results, whether in his professional or personal life. It includes a unit on the interpretation of dreams. On the Egyptian website of Google, you can see many interpretations and questions about followers. What is the interpretation of a dream about buying a gold ring according to Ibn Sirin? The imam said: The person who sees this dream and chooses the best of all the rings he finds at the jeweler is a sign that he is excited to undertake some task in which he will succeed and will be the reason for his prestigious and social status. His position. Or between work colleagues. If a woman wants to feel happy and stable with her husband and in general in her life, as for a girl, she seeks to become a wife as quickly as possible and her desire will come true and a suitor will come. That you are satisfied with in religion and morals. Buying a large golden ring means reaching a high position for a man, and for a woman, it is a very dear desire that will soon come true. Interpretation of a dream about buying a gold ring for single women: If the girl is not engaged to the subject of marriage but is busy with the subject of study or work, Buying a gold ring in a dream for a single woman means diligence and hard work until she achieves her goals and reaches her ambition. Plan. But if she is interested in engagement and marriage, the golden ring means the right person who asks for her hand in marriage and accepts it from family members, especially if she chooses a diamond-studded ring, which means that she lives with him in extravagance and a distinguished social class. If she goes with her father to buy it, it means that she She is very attached to her father and feels worried about his health at that time, but in reality she will be fine and he will be healthy. Interpretation of a dream about buying a gold ring for single women. Does the girl think a lot about engagement and marriage? Perhaps this was the reason why she saw this dream in her dream, but if it was not important to her, then this indicates the fulfillment of the wants and desires that she wants, such as being a superior girl who is also loved by everyone. And to find someone who suits her and is equal to her in social level and intellect. Buying her a wide ring on her finger is a sign of a good life, even if she is poor or suffers from

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing the road in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a road in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a road in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a wide road in a dream? What did officials say about seeing a road full of wild animals in a dream? What are the subtle signs that you dream of crossing a dark road? Learn about several interpretations of this scene in the article below. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. The road in a dream. These are the most famous visions of the street symbol: One for a dream of an easy road without detours: It indicates ease of reaching goals, resolving complications, and abandoning sorrows. See the short road: It means approaching happiness and achieving goals without patience and waiting. See more From Path: The dreamer's confusion appears, as he wants to achieve many goals in his life, but he does not know the right path, but if the dreamer sees that he is walking on more than one path and reaches them all in many interesting places, then the dream indicates successive successes and good news in the dreamer's life. I dream of a sunny road: It indicates the dreamer’s commitment, as he is a religious person and does not follow the paths of forbidden and misguidance. However, if the sun is burning, then the scene indicates suffering and fatigue in life. Seeing the moon at the end of the road: It indicates the dreamer’s marriage, and if The moon radiates a white and calm light, so the scene indicates a happy marriage, but if the moon emits red rays, then the vision indicates anger, torment, and an unhappy marriage. The road in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: The symbol of the road is interpreted by the dreamer’s life, and if the road is long, it may The dreamer's life will be long and his life will be long, but a short road indicates an early death. If the dreamer sees that the narrow road he was walking on suddenly widens, and this made him feel great happiness in the vision, then this indicates the repayment of debts, the solution of problems, stability, and peace of mind. And if the dreamer He was walking on the road in a car, and it suddenly collapsed, and he remained standing in the middle of the place. He could not return and could not complete the road. This dream is one of the worst scenes that a person dreams of. Of, because it indicates confusion, fatigue, and struggle with a major crisis that changes the dreamer’s life for the worse. Seeing the road in a dreamThe road to a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried woman dreams that she is walking on a road filled with black smoke, the dream indicates that her life will be filled with many problems and difficulties. If The road that the dreamer saw in the dream was beautiful, and she saw a white horse in the middle of the road, so she rode it and was happy in the dream. The scene indicates a happy married life, where her husband’s character and morals are indisputable, and she is characterized by religiosity and high status. If the dreamer sees burning fires on the road that she was traveling In his dream, the vision may indicate many sins that she has committed in her life, or the scene warns her of bad friends. When an unmarried woman finds a golden ring in a dream on the road she was walking on, this is a sign that she will meet and get to know her life partner soon, and she will be crowned. Their relationship

title: What are the most important interpretations of black shoes in a dream?

preview.html: Black shoes in a dreamBlack shoes in a dream are a recurring vision for many people, but the interpretation of this vision brings goodness to the single woman, as it is marriage for her, a lot of sustenance for the married woman, and the fulfillment of ambition for both sexes. Interpretation of a dream about black shoes in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about black shoes in a dream for a single woman, this is good news for her imminent relationship or marriage to a man who treats her in a way that pleases God, because among his qualities are generosity and good morals. As for the appearance of a large number of black shoes in different shapes in a woman’s dream, this is It means that there are a lot of men and young men who want to get involved with her, but she will be confused because she cannot choose the best one. They are.If black shoes have high heels in an unmarried girl’s dream, then this dream shows signs of the girl’s feminine qualities that make many want to be associated with her and this makes her engaged in the near future.If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing black shoes, but the size is larger From the size of her feet, this dream is interpreted to mean that she will reach out and marry a pious man, but his age is much older than hers. As for the unmarried girl who is still studying or working and is already engaged and she sees that she is wearing black high-heeled shoes, this dream portends her superiority and obtaining... High grades or promotion in her job due to her succession. Practical achievements. Ibn Sirin explained that if an unmarried girl buys black shoes in a dream, this dream shows that there are radical changes in the dreamer’s life, such as success in study or work, and this will attract the attention of everyone around her. If an unmarried girl wears black shoes New in her dream, Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream as meaning that she will obtain a high position in society or find her identity by traveling to work abroad. The evil of seeing black shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman can lead to losing or losing the shoe, because it indicates the possibility of injury. One of her relatives is sick. The meaning of a dream about black shoes in a dream for a married woman. Black shoes in a dream. Code: Black shoes in a dream for a married woman. This indicates kindness towards her and her family, such as abundant food, a new baby, or something else. If a married woman sees in her dream black high-heeled shoes and she is the one wearing them This dream portends the advancement of her family life to a better level, because she is a woman with good taste and loves elegance, as she is. he. An attractive woman. The presence of dirty black shoes in a married woman’s dream and her trying to clean them in the dream, this dream indicates that she is going through some family circumstances and problems that need someone to think positively about her so as not to destroy her. Home page.Also, black shoes in a dream for a married woman indicate her husband’s piety, justice, and morals, as he is the best man in her life, and she searched for him a lot among the men who proposed to her. If a married woman loses her black shoes in a dream, then this dream is a warning that problems Doubles

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father in a dream is good news

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father in a dream is good news. A father is great for his children and his family in general. He cannot fill his place with anyone. He is a role model for his children. He is responsible for raising them well, and the father must accompany his children and be a good friend to them. What is the interpretation of a dream about the death of a father in a dream? It is good news. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father in a dream while he is alive. The dreamer hopes that his father will always be with him, but he may feel anxious if he finds him sad or sad. Sick, so the death of the father has something to do with the psychological aspect, but it does not indicate actual death at all: Seeing the father dying in a dream is a sign of a long life that will accompany the deceased father in the dream. In many cases, a dream about the death of a father can be a sign of Father's great success and success. It is also a sign that he will travel and succeed in his travels and be able to fulfill his dreams through his travels. Also, his father gets a great status in the afterlife when he sees that his father does not die at all. It also indicates that this father will be martyred for the sake of God. Also, a pregnant woman suffers from pregnancy stress, and there is a danger to her health when she sees this dream. Moreover, a married woman has children who are good and fair to her. Likewise, her father wants to end the dispute between him and his married daughter when he sees that her father died in her dream See also: Interpretation of seeing green olives in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of a dream about a father dying while he is alive for single people. Losing a father is considered one of the most difficult things that can happen to a person. He creates a bond and home scene for his children. The father is considered their bond and protector, and his children depend on him for everything: The girl gets a lot of profits, which is her profits when she dreams of her father’s death and she cries for him. Also, if she cooperates with him, her business will flourish and she will achieve many and huge profits. Also, if this girl is a science student , she will succeed in her studies and obtain the highest grades. This is also evidence that her father is a righteous man who is close to God in worship and obedience. Moreover, the children of a married woman are fair and just when she sees the death of her father in a dream. In addition, a single girl marries a A person with good morals, as well as dealing with her. This girl can also fulfill her dreams and aspirations that she has been trying to achieve for a long time. It also comforts the married woman who has an attachment to her father when she sees in her dream that he has died and cries for him deeply. Soon she will also give birth to good offspring. If she does not have children. See also: Interpretation of seeing a jacket in a dream for single and married women. The dream of a father’s death in a dream is good news for a man. No matter how old a man is, he remains attached to his father, so he consults him in most matters of his life and loves to sit with him to benefit from his experiences in life, and his death is great. for him. Misfortune: The father learns some secrets that his son is trying to hide from him when he sees his father dying in a dream. Also, this person will be successful in his trade and will achieve a lot of success.

title: Seeing a dead father smiling in a dream

preview.html: He was smiling, and he explained that he would see his father, enjoy peace of mind, and live in the best condition, God willing, and be free from troubles. Interpretation of seeing the deceased father and smiling in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her deceased father was smiling a lot in a dream. It announces great goodness, and this single girl will face him in her life, and she will make him happy, God willing. And if an unmarried girl sees that she is looking at the dead father and smiling at him a lot. It indicates that he will relax his mind and get rid of the troubles and problems that he was seeing and going through. And the unmarried girl who looks at the dead father in a dream and smiles at her and was beautiful. It indicates that her father lives in his high house in his absolute house and in the goodness of God Almighty. And the unmarried girl saw that her living father had died in a dream, so he smiled at her very loudly. It indicates that her father is at peace in his life and that he is in the best condition at this time, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of the crying of the dead in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing a deceased father smiling in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that her dead father was smiling in a dream And he is next to her children. This indicates that the married woman will live a comfortable life, God willing. And if the married woman sees the living dead father in a dream, and he smiles at her with a bright smile. A sign that her father will live comfortably and free from many problems and worries. A married woman sees a deceased father smiling at her and smiling at her husband in a dream. An indication that he reassures her in her life, and that he is pleased with her stability in her married life. And the married woman who sees her deceased father smiling often at her children in a dream. An indication of her success in raising her children and getting rid of the troubles she saw with them, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the deceased father and smiling in a dream for a divorced woman If the divorced woman dreams that her deceased father was smiling loudly in a dream. An indication that her deceased father reassures her, and her condition in life, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. And if the divorced woman looks at the deceased father in a dream, he laughs with her and smiles. An indication of the good that you see, and this divorced woman will live in her life, God willing. Seeing the divorced woman sitting with her ex-husband and their deceased father was Smiling. Dal will return to her husband again soon and will be happy with him. If the divorced woman sees the living dead father in a dream, smile at her a lot. A clear indication that her parents will live in peace in his life, God willing. Read also: What is the interpretation of seeing a wounded dead person in a dream? Interpretation of seeing a dead father and smiling in a dream about a man and its meaning If a man sees in a dream that the deceased father was sitting next to him, and smiled in a dream. It announces that he will be happy in his life and will get rid of the big problems he was going through. And the man who saw that the living father had died in a dream and smiled at him very much. A clear sign that his living father will stay away from problems and live comfortably. What if the dreamer sees that the dead father is laughing next to him and smiling at him. This indicates the end of the problems and the removal of

title: Interpretation of innocence in a dream: Seeing innocence in a dream

preview.html: The dream of innocence for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether innocent in court and acquitted of the charge or lawsuit, seeing the oppressor and the oppressed by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of innocence in a dream. Ibn Sirin mentions that seeing innocence in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be safe from the difficulties and dangers that he may face. The dreamer. Whoever sees the acquittal of the accusation in a dream, the dream is a sign that the dreamer will be freed from crises and hardships and will overcome the suffering he suffered. The oppressed person in a dream is the one who sees that he has been acquitted. The dream shows that the dreamer is living in a situation in which he feels oppressed and suffers from oppression. He feels the necessity of overcoming this injustice and obtaining all his rights. The oppressor in a dream, if he is acquitted, the vision here indicates that there are major problems and obstacles on your way to you from a deceitful person close to you. It is said that acquittal in a dream is a praiseworthy dream and is usually interpreted as Obtaining a great livelihood and overcoming the difficulties that the dreamer was facing. Anyone who sees that he has attained innocence in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will be safe from some of the things that he fears. Any person who sees that he has attained innocence in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will be safe. Among some things that he always warns against. The unmarried woman who dreams Being acquitted from prison is a sign that the dreamer will gain freedom, feel optimistic, and will be able to achieve her goals and satisfy her desires, God willing. An unmarried woman who sees that she has achieved acquittal in a dream after receiving accusations, the dream is an indication that the dreamer is sincere. A married woman who sees innocence in a dream after being accused, the dream is a sign However, she will get rid of all difficulties and arguments with her husband, and it is good news that the family will live a happy life without problems, God willing. title: Interpretation of dreams: My child harasses me in a dream

Seeing my child abusing me in a dream could express problems with him, and God knows the unseen. When you see the son abusing you, this may lead to a warning not to pay attention to the son, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his son abusing him, this may indicate trouble. And the bad news, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams that my child is being harassed in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that my child is being harassed in a dream may be evidence of his weak personality. And God knows the unseen. When you see your child being harassed, this may lead to the problems he goes through. And God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his child being harassed in a dream, it may be This is a sign of the difficult problems he faces, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees molesting a young child, this may lead to a lack of mercy and ingratitude, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams of a child drowning in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a child drowning in a dream. Your child drowning may represent problems, and God knows the unseen, while if the dreamer sees the child drowning in clean water. This may lead to lawful food, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the child drowning and saves him, this may be a sign of solving problems, and God knows the unseen. It may also express the child’s tenderness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a strange child in the house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a strange child in the house In a dream, a strange, unclear child can indicate crises that make him unable to get out of them, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a strange, unclear child, this may indicate the presence of a problem, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a child crying, this may indicate distress, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about an incomplete child in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about an incomplete child in a dream may be evidence of failure to achieve goals, as it may indicate the lack of perfection of the thing he is pursuing, and God knows the unseen. When A married man sees a retarded child. This can lead to things that prevent him from achieving goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees an incompletely developed child, this may indicate that he has not completed his goals, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees a child with blue eyes in a dream, this may represent happy circumstances, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a child with blue eyes. In a dream, this may indicate calm and comfort. Interpretation of a dream about a big child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a big child in a dream. title: What is the interpretation of vomiting in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of vomiting in a dream? A question that many people are searching for an answer to, as many people find vomiting in a dream disturbing, and dream interpretation researchers have interpreted this dream accurately so that everyone who sees this dream knows its meaning and message, so we will show you in this article the answer to the question: What is the interpretation of vomiting? In a dream on the site Various. What is the interpretation of vomiting in a dream? There are many dreams in which the dreamer sees vomiting in a dream, and each of these dreams has its own interpretation according to Ibn Sirin, such as: The following: The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin interprets vomiting in a dream as a sign of Sadness and an indication of the dreamer’s good spirit. But if he is unable to vomit in the dream and the dreamer hates this taste, then this means hatred. If the dreamer vomits while fasting and then the dreamer drowns in the vomit, this indicates the existence of a debt that he cannot repay. Whoever sees in a dream that he swallowed pearls And he vomited honey, this means that the dreamer is learning the interpretation of the Holy Qur’an. As for the one who dreams that he drinks milk and vomits honey and milk, this means repentance from sins and returning to God Almighty. As for the one who dreams that he wants to vomit but is unable, this indicates the difficulty of repentance, and if he repents He returned to sin. And whoever thinks he vomited milk, this indicates his apostasy from Islam. If someone sees that he is vomiting food, this means that he is giving something to someone. Interpretation of a dream of vomiting in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin believes that vomiting in a dream varies depending on the situation. In a married woman’s dream, its interpretation is represented as follows: If a married woman dreams that she is vomiting and the color of her vomit is black, this means that she will get rid of the problems and worries in her mind. But if a married woman sees that a snake is vomiting, this means that she will die soon. Severe and profuse vomiting indicates He will die soon. But if a married woman sees that she is vomiting blood, this means that she will get money soon. But if a married woman sees her vomiting blood and dripping blood on the ground, this means the return of someone who has been away from her for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about vomiting in a dream for pregnant and single women. Interpret Ibn Sirin vomiting in a dream for an unmarried woman and a pregnant woman has a different meaning as follows: If she dreams of vomiting, this is a sign that God will give her happiness, stability, and joy in her life, in addition to compensating for the difficult days she went through. If she dreams of vomiting while she is already poor, this is It means that her condition will change and she will become rich, but if she is rich, this is evidence that she will lose money. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is vomiting, this means that she will give birth to a healthy child without diseases. But if a pregnant woman dreams that she is vomiting a lot, then death is near. For a single girl, vomiting in a dream will indicate freedom from the worries and problems she is going through. As for the dream interpretation of seeing a woman vomiting blood in a dream, this means that she has been liberated from the enemy and has become safe from enemies. But when she sees that she is vomiting during her sleep, she feels pain in her stomach. , it means

title: I dreamed that I came back

preview.html: I dreamed that I came back in a dream through the vision site roy2a.com, reflux is the expulsion of stomach contents through the mouth, and the reason for this is often that the digestive system has some defects, and sometimes cases of reflux or vomiting are serious and have many complications and today through This article will present to you I dreamed that I was returning, according to the great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars. Follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was returning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the fold in a dream, and it indicates the dreamer’s remorse for The sins and disobedience he committed in his life and his sincere repentance to God. To see in a dream that you go backwards without anything coming out of your mouth indicates that the dreamer is exposed to many health problems that may lead to his life, and God knows best. The return of milk in a dream refers to The dreamer is going through a bad period and feels disappointment and despair. Seeing difficulty in twisting in a dream shows that the dreamer does not have the ability to make the right decisions in his life and feels helpless and frustrated. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing blood flowing in a dream. I dreamed that I was returning in a dream to Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will interpret the vision Folding while fasting in a dream. It indicates that the fortuneteller has faced many failures in his professional life. Looking back in the dream is the dreamer’s return to his Lord and his repentance for the sins he committed in his life. Returning bad food in a dream shows the priest’s injustice to someone and obtains his right by lying. Seeing The reflux of blood in a dream refers to the disposal of money that the viewer obtained illegally. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing boils in a dream. I dreamed that I was returning in a dream to Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s explanation of seeing a stomach wrap in a dream. It indicates the dreamer’s near future, and God knows best. Vision. Wrapped food in a dream indicates that the dreamer has lost something important in his life, and God knows best. Reversing fasting in a dream states that there is a debt owed by the viewer and he must pay it. Seeing a poor man returning in a dream indicates that God will grant the dreamer a lot of goodness and blessing in his life. Read an explanation. Another: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream: I dreamed that I was going back in a dream to single women. Seeing an unmarried woman going back in a dream shows that the fortuneteller will hear happy news about his life in the coming period. Returning and nausea in one dream indicates that her conditions and circumstances will improve for the better in the coming period. Seeing a woman A single woman wrapped in white in a dream shows that she will marry someone who has a lot of money. I dreamed that I was going back in a dream to a married woman. Seeing a married woman going back in a dream shows that the coming period of her life will be full of happiness, comfort, and stability. She is trying to return to a married dream. It indicates that she is a good woman. She makes a great effort to make her husband and children happy. Seeing cleaning the reverse gear in a dream for a married woman indicates that she does a lot of charitable work.

title: Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream, a ram in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Learn with us the interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream. The Shah is one of the animals honored by God Almighty. Most of the prophets worked in herding sheep, which are harmless pets that have many benefits for humans. Seeing a sheep in a dream is interpreted with many interpretations that differ according to the nature of the person who saw it. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream by Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin in detail Dreams are a group of scenes and situations that a person experiences during his sleep at night, and despite the fact that many people believe that dreams are nothing but things. Man thinks about it. During the day, they come to embody him at night in his dreams. However, what is constant in various human cultures is that dreams carry many symbols and signals related to one’s reality and life, so that dreams are a reflection of one’s reality and bring him many mysteries, so people search for interpretations To learn about the interpretation of seeing sheep in a dream in detail from Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, follow us in the following lines from the encyclopedia. Sheep in a dream. Al-Nabulsi interprets seeing a sheep slaughtered in a dream and its meat distributed among the people after the death of a strong man and the division of his money. He also interprets the vision of slaughtering a sheep in a dream as a sacrifice, good news that pays off the dreamer’s debts and alleviates his worries. The story of an unmarried girl, a sheep in her dream, is interpreted by Ibn Shaheen as her marriage to a weak man who owns great wealth. But if he is a strong sheep, explain to him that he will marry A strong man and he lives a good life with him. If a woman is pregnant and sees in her dreams someone giving her a sheep, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep in a dream and a ram in a dream. Imam Muhammad bin Sirin divided the interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream into interpretations of good and interpretations of evil. We direct them to you in detail in Our article today. Among the signs of benevolence when seeing a sheep: Seeing a man giving a sheep to someone in a dream indicates that God Almighty will soon grant him good offspring, God willing. When a man sees one of his friends or relatives slaughtering a sheep, his vision indicates that this person has made a pilgrimage to the House of God in The same year in which the dreamer saw his vision. Whoever was imprisoned and saw himself in a dream slaughtering a sheep, his vision indicates relief, release from prison, and obtaining freedom in the near future. Whoever acquires the wool of a craftsman in his dream will obtain goodness, wealth, and a great inheritance in his life, God willing. And when he sees A person himself sells sheep while he is already sick, and God Almighty will heal him from his illness. When a man sees a sheep in his house without it causing him noise or harm, his vision indicates that he will obtain goodness, success, and great wealth in his life. And when you see an organized flock of sheep in a dream, This is a good vision that shows the sustenance and goodness that the dreamer will obtain, and the goodness that he will obtain will be the many, many sheep that he saw in the dream. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees himself giving a sheep in a dream indicates that he will be blessed with good offspring. As for the opinion of those who know him While he slaughters a sheep in his dream, this indicates that...
